End.Body: So, yeah... It turns out a metaphysical concept whose whole MO is killing people is kinda a garbage date. Major yikes! Kinda cringe! You're not sure why you didn't suspect as much sooner, but hey, you win some- you lose some; at least you got a cute cat out of it- oh yeah the cat's fine btw.

Void2.Body: Death: *Scoffs* Pronouns? What a funny joke! Hats off to you mortal! Moreover, this puts me in the mind of an Andrew Tate lecture I watched- certainly you're familiar?

Void1.Body: You: Name's Dee, Big Boy~. Oh, and it's cool cuz I didn't tell you, but I don't super like being called mister- my pronouns are-

Void.Body: Death: Mortal. For your crimes against life itself- oh, it's you. I appreciate your willingness to call me at work- uh- Mr. Erie was it? Sorry for the hasle.

Preamble.Body: You: *Yawning sounds* ... *More yawning* ... *Have you watched Yawn of the Dead? I hear it's really good* ... *yawn*

Prologue.Body: You: Oh! What's this?! Today's the day I set up that Date with Death! I'm so excited- he's so hot and slay and stuff. The hitch is: to get ready I gotta commit a crime against life itself- which is weird, but ignoring any and all red flags- seems easy enough for someone like me!

Prologue1.Body: You: If I remember my highschool physics, I can whip up a DIY teslatron and make Schrodinger's cat- which, as everyone knows, is the most easily-made, extra-real life-crime you can commit, and not just a thought experiment. Yup! Anyway, where to start...?

Bedroom.Body:
You are in your bedroom. It's got a bed in it and it does loosely meet the description of a room. 
(Click on the glowy stuff to play... Or don't... I'm not your dad.)

Washroom.Body: You enter the washroom. These are very common in Canada- the place you live- this game takes place in Canada.

Living Room.Body: This is your living room. Maybe, after today, you should call it a "dying room?" Haha! Ammirite...? Actually no, because that'd be stupid.

Kitchen.Body: Ah yes, the kitchen. A place of dinning and socratic questions such as "Why do they call it an oven when you of in cold food?" Truely a place of majesty.

Alley.Body: This is the alley way outside your house. It wasn't this messy- was it? You can't really say; you don't get out much. Oh hey there's a cat here!
